co.cask.cdap.etl.api.batch

Class SparkSink<IN>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.etl.api.batch.BatchConfigurable<SparkPluginContext>
      • co.cask.cdap.etl.api.batch.SparkSink<IN>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - The type of input record to the SparkSink.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PipelineConfigurable, Serializable

    @Beta
public abstract class SparkSink<IN>
extends BatchConfigurable<SparkPluginContext>
implements Serializable
    SparkSink composes a final, optional stage of a Batch ETL Pipeline. In addition to configuring the Batch run, it can also perform RDD operations on the key value pairs provided by the Batch run. run(co.cask.cdap.etl.api.batch.SparkExecutionPluginContext, org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<IN>) method is called inside the Batch Run while BatchConfigurable.prepareRun(T) and BatchConfigurable.onRunFinish(boolean, T) methods are called on the client side, which launches the Batch run, before the Batch run starts and after it finishes respectively.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
